lens: Fujinon Lens XF60mm F2.4 R Macro
shutterspeed: (P mode) 1/4 sec. to 1/4000 sec., (All other modes) 30 sec. to 1/4000 sec., Bulb (max. 60 min.), Time 2 to 30 sec.
exposuremode: Programmed AE, Shutter priority AE, Aperture priority AE, Manual Exposure
focusmode: Single AF / Continuous AF / MF Distance Indicator
sensitivity: Auto, Equivalent to ISO 200-6400 (Standard Output Sensitivity)
exporsurecompensation: -2.0 EV – +2.0 EV, inclement with 1/3 EV step
movierecording: 1920 x 1080 pixels, 1280 x 720 pixels (24 frames/sec.) with stereo sound
imagesensor: 23.6 mm x 15.6 mm (APS-C) X-Trans CMOS with primary color filter
